# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Generate .NET 8 code and place files inside the solution structure.
- Follow best practices for code readability and maintainability.

## Project-Specific Rules
- The repository is located at `D:\Project\Project_B` on the `master` branch (origin: https://github.com/hptbee/Project_B).
- Ensure all projects target .NET 8.
